name: Craftsman's Writ - Greater Arcane Protection Potion
tooltip:
Craftsman's Writ - Greater Arcane Protection Potion

Deliver 15 Greater Arcane Protection Potions and the Craftsman's Writ - Greater Arcane Protection Potion - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

Requirements:
- Greater Arcane Protection Potion x 15
